event.title: FSFE in FrOSCon in St. Augustin, Germany

body.p: The FSFE will be present in the Free and Open Source Software Conference with a booth and two talks. Lina Ceballos, FSFE Project Manager, will present 'REUSE: Making copyright and licensing compliance easier'. Matthias Kirschner, FSFE President, will give an author reading of the book Ada und Zangemann.
